body:
Hi Tim,



As Mona said videos are a great place to start. We also started this two premiers for Ladybug and Honeybee that you may find useful:

[https://www.gitbook.com/book/mostapharoudsari/ladybug-premier/details](https://www.gitbook.com/book/mostapharoudsari/ladybug-premier/details)

[https://www.gitbook.com/book/mostapharoudsari/honeybee-premier/details](https://www.gitbook.com/book/mostapharoudsari/honeybee-premier/details)



The components are connected to [Hydra](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/) where you can find some examples for each component.



Mostapha
